00021 /**
00022  * @file   CalvinCHPQuantificationDetectionFileBufferWriter.h
00023  * @author David Le
00024  * @date   Mon May 15 12:09:42 2006
00025  * 
00026  * @brief  Class for writing Quantifications to a buffer before writing to CHP files.
00027  */
00028 
00029 #ifndef _CHPQUANTIFICATIONDETECTIONFILEBUFFERWRITER_HEADER_
00030 #define _CHPQUANTIFICATIONDETECTIONFILEBUFFERWRITER_HEADER_
00031 
00032 #include <cstring>
00033 #include <string>
00034 #include <vector>
00035 //
00036 
00037 #define MAX_BUFFER_SIZE                         5242880         // 5 MB
00038 
00039 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00040 {
00041 class CHPQuantificationDetectionFileBufferWriter
00042 {
00043 public:
00044         /*! Constructor */
00045         CHPQuantificationDetectionFileBufferWriter();
00046 
00047         /*! Destructor */
00048         ~CHPQuantificationDetectionFileBufferWriter();
00049 
00050         /*! Set maximum buffer size */
00051         void SetMaxBufferSize(int MaxBufferSize) { m_MaxBufferSize = MaxBufferSize; }
00052 
00053         /*! Cleans up memory */
00054         void Cleanup();
00055 
00056         /*! Initialize Quantification buffer writer
00057          * @param CHPFileNames Reference to a list of CHP file names.
00058          */
00059         void Initialize(std::vector<std::string> *CHPFileNames);
00060 
00061         /*! Write a quantification entry to buffer. If the buffer is full, flush it.
00062          * @param target Target for the quantification entry.
00063          * @param quantification Value for the quantification entry.
00064          * @param pvalue The pvalue for the entry.
00065          */
00066         void WriteQuantificationDetectionEntry(int target, float quantification, float pvalue);
00067 
00068         /*! Write the content of the buffer to CHP files. */
00069         void FlushBuffer();
00070 
00071 private:
00072         // Pointer to list of CHP file names.
00073         std::vector<std::string> *m_CHPFileNames;
00074 
00075         // List of targets used for storing quantification entries.
00076         std::vector< std::vector<std::pair<float, float> > > m_TargetQuantificationDetectionBuffers;
00077 
00078         // Buffer for storing quantification row indexes.
00079         std::vector<int> m_TargetQuantificationDetectionRowIndexes;
00080 
00081         // Size of the current buffer in bytes.
00082         int m_BufferSize;
00083 
00084         // Maximum size of the buffer before it gets flushed
00085         int m_MaxBufferSize;
00086 };
00087 
00088 }
00089 
00090 #endif // _CHPQUANTIFICATIONDETECTIONFILEBUFFERWRITER_HEADER_
